name: entity_1737015482
physicalDescription: Tall, athletic build, with short, silver hair and eyes that shift color due to nanomachines
culture: Raised in a technocratic society of 2078
technology: High Tech nanomachines and interdimensional travel gear

notableEvents.Event: Unintentionally fell into a rift in the fabric of space-time
Met mentor, an ancient entity known as VA-23
notableEvents.Details: VA-23 guides them through the intricacies of inter-dimensional travel

notableEvents.Event: Encountered an entity, known only as The Maw, which threatened countless dimensions
notableEvents.Consequence: Decided to protect the multiverse from The Maw

Vast knowledge of quantum physics and the fabric of space-time
Rapid regeneration due to nanomachine augmentation

relationships.Name: VA-23

Understand their own nature and existence

Diverting The Maw's attempt to consume dimensions
basePrompt: Generate a specific, unique character with concrete details. DO NOT list options - choose specific traits and elaborate on them. Example format: 'A former quantum physicist from [specific year] who discovered they were a synthetic being created by [specific group/entity]. They possess [2-3 specific abilities] due to [specific cause]. Their core drive is [specific goal] because [specific reason]. They are mentored by [specific character] who [specific detail about mentor]. A pivotal moment occurred when [specific event] which led to [specific consequence]. They now face the challenge of [specific problem] while trying to [specific goal].' Create your own character following this pattern of specific details, but make it completely different from this example. Focus on concrete details that make the character unique and memorable. Avoid placeholder text or lists of options.
timelineStructure: Nonlinear due to time travel and dimension hopping
